AND p.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')

SELECT p.article_id, p.title, u.nickname, p.content, f.access_url as image_url, DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as created_at, DATE_FORMAT(p.updated_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as updated_at FROM article p JOIN user u ON p.user_id = u.user_id join file f on p.file_id = f.file_id WHERE p.is_del = '1' and p.is_drafts = '0' AND p.article_id = #{id}

SELECT a.article_id AS id, a.title, a.content, a.is_drafts AS status, a.file_id, f.access_url AS coverUrl, DATE_FORMAT(a.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.updated_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS updateTime FROM article a LEFT JOIN file f ON a.file_id = f.file_id WHERE a.article_id = #{id} AND a.user_id = #{loginUserId} AND a.is_del = 1

SELECT p.article_id, p.title, u.nickname, p.content, f.access_url as image_url, DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as created_at, DATE_FORMAT(p.updated_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as updated_at, p.user_id FROM article p JOIN user u ON p.user_id = u.user_id join file f on p.file_id = f.file_id WHERE p.is_del = '1' and p.is_drafts = '0' AND p.article_id = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM article a WHERE a.user_id = #{id} AND a.is_del = 1 AND a.is_drafts = 0

SELECT a.article_id, a.title, a.created_at, a.view_count, a.like_count, a.content, a.cover_url, t.id as tag_id, t.name as tag_name, t.slug, t.description, t.icon, t.color FROM article a LEFT JOIN article_tag at ON a.article_id = at.article_id LEFT JOIN tag t ON at.tag_id = t.id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} AND a.is_del = 1 AND a.is_drafts = 0 AND (t.is_del IS NULL OR t.is_del = 0) ORDER BY a.created_at DESC

SELECT a.article_id, a.title, a.created_at, a.view_count, a.like_count, a.content, a.cover_url, t.id as tag_id, t.name as tag_name, t.slug, t.description, t.icon, t.color FROM user_favorites uf JOIN article a ON uf.target_id = a.article_id LEFT JOIN article_tag at ON a.article_id = at.article_id LEFT JOIN tag t ON at.tag_id = t.id WHERE uf.user_id = #{userId} AND a.is_del = 1 AND (t.is_del IS NULL OR t.is_del = 0) and uf.type = #{article} ORDER BY uf.created_at DESC
